com.isotrol.impe3.core.modules
Interface StartedModule<T extends Module>

Type Parameters:
T - Module class.
public interface StartedModule<T extends Module>

Interface representing a running module.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez.

Method Summary
 Object getAction(ActionContext context)
          Returns an action object.
 T getModule()
          Returns a type-safe accessor to the provisions of the module.
 ModuleDefinition<T> getModuleDefinition()
          Returns the module definition.
 Object getProvision(String name)
          Returns an exported bean.
 void stop()
          Stops a running module.
 

Method Detail

getModuleDefinition

ModuleDefinition<T> getModuleDefinition()
Returns the module definition.

Returns:
The module definition.

getProvision

Object getProvision(String name)
Returns an exported bean.

Parameters:
name - Name of the exported bean.
Returns:
The exported bean.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the requested bean is not exported.

getModule

T getModule()
Returns a type-safe accessor to the provisions of the module.

Returns:
An implementation of the module class.

getAction

Object getAction(ActionContext context)
Returns an action object.

Parameters:
context - Action context.
Returns:
The requested action.
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the module is not a component module.
IllegalArgumentException - if the module provides no action with the requested name.

stop

void stop()
Stops a running module. The behaviour of any method after closing is unspecified.
